Hello, I'm Jeremy,

a product designer & filmmaker based in Seattle, WA.

At Starbucks, I lead the product design team working on a new progressive web app.

Elsewhere, I collaborate with organizations, brand, and ultimately friends on telling their story in a lot of different formats. Operating a camera, writing Javascript, or designing an interaction are the easy part. Communicating something valuable or providing something useful for the world is much, much harder.

Let’s making something great together.
